title: Oma's Key Lime Pie with Coconut Cookie Crust
markdown:
Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

* 43 vanilla wafers (¼ cups crumbs)
* ½ cup sweetened coconut
* 6 Tbs melted butter
* 3 egg yolks
* 1 can sweetened condensed milk
* ½ cup key lime juice
* 1 tsp lime zest
* Preheat oven to 350 degrees
* Crust:
* Pulse in food processor all the vanilla wafers (you’ll need ¼ cups crumbs)
* Add coconut and melted butter and pulse to blend
* Press mixture along bottom and up side of a 9in pan
* Filling: 
* Beat yolks until they are lemon colored
* Blend in sweetened condensed milk then add in lime juice and zest
* Stir until well blended
* Pour into the 9in pan
* Bake 12 min until mixture is set
* If using a glass pie pan, bake at 325 degrees
